main event: A metal object with a bright glow, colored green and white, remained motionless in the sky for 15 to 20 seconds before disappearing in the distance.
interesting points: The object had a color of green and white.
It remained motionless in a straight line for 15 to 20 seconds.
The witness compared the appearance of the object to an oval platter moving away in the sky.
The object was spotted by the witness and three other young men, but they did not know each other.
The witness estimated the object was about 1,000 yards or half a mile away and moved at a very fast speed of around 1,000 mph.
sighted object: metal object with a bright glow
